issue.title: GUI overlay is not shown unless you point at the widget with mouse

content.raw: Im on 2.2 (just havent done my research yet on whether the ros api works on gazebo5 or not). I just tried using gtk video record inside my parallels box, and wierd enough, the flicker doesnt cover the whole window, but rather you can see at the bottom of the window a smaller flicker.. not sure why. Here is a link for that [video](https://www.dropbox.com/s/a0yleeo53dfebku/parallels_10_gazebo_flicker.ogv?dl=0).  I recorded a video off of my phone so that you can see how it actually [looks](https://www.dropbox.com/s/u9n5eguvm1ntv87/20150318_125027.mp4?dl=0).  If i constantly move my mouse over the gazebo window, then the gittering stop, until something in the window moves again.
